text: Hartston is a surname of English origin. People with that name include: * Jana Bellin (born Jana Malypetrová, 1947), Czech-born British chess player, formerly married to William Hartston * William Hartston (born 1947), English journalist, chess player and chess author * William Hartston (physician) (1904-1980), English physician, president of the History of Medicine Society of the Royal Society of Medicine 1973-1975 ==See also== * Category:Surnames of English origin
title: Hartston
